title: Sof Aguiar
text:
Hi, I’m Sof!
And welcome to my portfolio. I’m a Statistics graduate currently researching Public Health and Epidemiology. Here, you’ll find my projects, publications and tutorials for R progamming.

title: Sof Aguiar
text:
Exploring how predictive models can enhance epidemiological studies and improve decision-making in healthcare.





Exploring resources and improving your Data Visualization





Techniques for analyzing interval-censored data, with applications in epidemiology and public health research.





A guide to using R for spatial data visualization and analysis in public health contexts.

title: Sof Aguiar
text:
Education
Bachelor’s Degree in Statistics
Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (UFMG)
- Expected Graduation: 2025
- Relevant Coursework: Data Analysis, Statistical Modeling, Machine Learning, Programming in R and Python
Technical High School in Mechatronics
Federal Center for Technological Education of Minas Gerais (CEFET-MG)
- Graduated: 2018


Research Experience
Research Assistant – Child Obesity Prediction
UFMG | August 2023 – Present
- Develop predictive algorithms for childhood obesity in the Brazilian population using descriptive analysis and statistical modeling.
- Collaborate with the UFMG School of Nursing and CIDACS (Center for Data Integration and Knowledge for Health).
- Presented research findings at the 12th Brazilian Congress of Epidemiology.
Research Assistant – Gender Bias in Word Embeddings
UFMG | October 2021 – October 2022
- Assisted in identifying and correcting gender biases in popular Word Embeddings.
- Worked with Python and natural language processing (NLP) techniques.


Professional Experience
People Analytics Intern
green4T | March 2024 – Present
- Develop and optimize HR processes using Power BI to create insightful reports on employee data.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve data-driven decision-making in the HR department.
Summer Intern
green4T | January 2024 – March 2024
- Contributed to sustainability projects using Design Thinking methodologies.
- Utilized R programming and Microsoft Office tools to analyze and present data.
Statistics Intern
Instituto Ver | November 2023 – January 2024
- Conducted quantitative data analysis for electoral and opinion research projects.
- Assisted in the preparation of statistical reports and visualizations.
President & Project Manager
ESTAT MG (Junior Statistics Company) | January 2021 – November 2022
- Led the company as President, overseeing administrative, financial, and accounting operations, achieving a 20% annual revenue growth.
- Managed statistical projects for clients, including data analysis, consulting, and private tutoring.


Skills

Programming Languages: R (Advanced), Python (Intermediate), SQL (Intermediate)

Data Analysis Tools: Power BI (Basic), Power Automate (Basic), Git/GitHub

Languages: English (Advanced), German (Basic)

Other Skills: Microsoft Office Suite, Data Storytelling, Statistical Modeling, Machine Learning



Certifications & Courses

Data Governance Fundamentals – DataCamp

Data Storytelling – DataCamp

Machine Learning for Health Predictions – 12th Brazilian Congress of Epidemiology

Spatial Data Visualization in R – 12th Brazilian Congress of Epidemiology
